Table of Contents

Name

clfind3 - experimenting with ClumpFind in 2D or 3D

Synopsis

clfind3 [parameter=value]

Description

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input file name [???]
out=
Output clump identification file name [???]
step=
Contour step [0.05]
start=
Starting step [1]
levmin=
Test one level: min []
levmax=
Test one level: max []
VERSION=
28-feb-2013 PJT [0.1]

Examples

See Also


http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1994ApJ...428..693W - ClumpFind
http://arxiv.org/abs/astro-ph/0601706/ - cprops

Files

Author

mkman
